folder: Hunton Street & Holly Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
Hunton Street, near Holly Street, showing dogwood blossoms on the M.D. Hunton property which is being developed into the Mount Hope Park Development. This is a set of three views taken the same day.

May 19, 1926
Views 1,2 and 3

P. L. Sperr

folder: Hunton Street & Holly Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
Hunton Street, at Holly Street, showing part of the land of the Mt. Hope Park Development in Dongan Hills. This is part of the M.D. Hunton property.

P. L. Sperr

(2)
Dogwood Blossoms near Hunton Street on the M.D. Hunton property which is being developed into the Mt. Hope Park Development.

P. L. Sperr

(3)
Another view near Hunton and Holly Streets.

P. L. Sperr

May 19, 1926.
